jobs.title: Senior Frontend Developer
jobs.description: We are seeking an experienced Frontend Developer to build high-quality user interfaces. Responsibilities include developing new features, maintaining code quality, and collaborating with designers and backend engineers.

jobs.title: Marketing Manager
jobs.description: Lead our marketing team to create and execute campaigns that drive brand awareness and user acquisition. Must have strong experience in digital marketing and team leadership.

jobs.title: Backend Developer (Go)
jobs.description: Design and implement robust, scalable backend services using Go. Experience with microservices architecture, PostgreSQL, and cloud platforms like AWS or GCP is required.

jobs.title: HR Business Partner
jobs.description: Act as a strategic partner to business units, providing HR guidance on recruitment, employee relations, and performance management. Strong understanding of Vietnamese labor law is a must.

jobs.title: Sales Executive
jobs.description: Join our dynamic sales team to drive revenue growth. You will be responsible for identifying new business opportunities, building client relationships, and closing deals.
